metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9317 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The gdImageCreate function in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (system hang)via an oversized image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6').
